attributes.action: Bring back Original Cadburys Dairy Milk to Creme Eggs
attributes.additional_details: Kraft have changed the recipe to the Creme Egg she'll where it longer has Dairy Milk but a different product. While Cadburys Creme Egg has not been advertised as 'Dairy Milk Creme Egg', this chocolate is a British institution which the American owners Kraft have now changed to a product which tastes completely different..
